game.name: Syrian Warfare

reviewHighlights.text: my Eye Doctor in Moscow said he loves this game
[b]Syrian Warfare is a pretty fun RTS, but it doubles as an RPG where you play the victim.[/b] Jokes aside, it's fun but can also be brutally challeng...
